circumstances: After takeoff from Otter Lake, SK, while in initial climb, the single engine airplane initiated a left turn then a right turn. It rolled left and right then pitched down and crashed in a wooded area. The aircraft was destroyed and all six occupants were killed.
probable_cause: The exact cause of the accident could not be determined with certainty. However, it was determined that the aircraft was equipped with only two safety belts with six people on board. Also, it was reported that the total weight of the aircraft at the time of the accident was 455 lbs above max gross weight.
